Author: oh_not_again_01
Text: I am deeply truly  sorry you had to go through such an experience. Please don't hurt yourself, not even with food. You deserve to be happy and loved. I wish all your pain goes away, all I can offer you is a hug and an invitation to DM me if you ever feel like talking to a stranger about any of this. If you can, please reach out to someone who can care and be there for you, or even a health professional. Be strong <3
